title: Collaborative Learning Competency Enhancement Program Through CSCL Tool Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool utilization skills and foundational knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Conducts team-based collaborative learning projects in BYOD environments, emphasizing design and application experience of CSCL tools for real-world social problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core features of CSCL tools and customize them for educational contexts.
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of CSCL tools using mixed research methods (experimental + qualitative studies).
Design collaborative learning scenarios for solving real societal issues and implement them via Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners can identify and improve contextual issues arising during the use of CSCL tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
